sentences.en: Many protoctistans are motile , using pseudopodia, cilia or flagella.
sentences.cn: 许多原生动物利用伪足 、 纤毛或鞭毛能运动.

sentences.en: Oomycetes and chytrids ( sometimes called water molds ) produce motile, flagellated spores in sporangia.
sentences.cn: 卵菌纲和壶菌在孢子囊中产生能动的带鞭毛的孢子.

sentences.en: Set up software of distribution production and curve of coupling motile for 4 D.
sentences.cn: 并建立了在样机上运行的线型生成软件及四轴耦合运动曲线.

sentences.en: The picture shows the motile container inspection system manufactured by Nuctech Company Limited.
sentences.cn: 图为同方威视生产车载式集装箱检查系统.

sentences.en: The spores and gametes could grow to new thalli independently, and the same to motile zygotes.
sentences.cn: 漂浮浒苔的游孢子、配子或配子结合形成的合子均能发育成一株新的藻体。

sentences.en: Zoospore An asexual motile spore produced by a zoosporangium.
